description: Backend JWT Guard depends on the AWS Cognito User Pool being provisioned to know the issuer and JWKS endpoint.
mitigation_plan: DevOps to provide Cognito ARN and endpoints to Backend team as soon as provisioned.
impact_if_delayed: Entire backend authentication layer is blocked.

description: The History API endpoints must be protected by the JWT Authentication Guard.
mitigation_plan: Use a global guard in NestJS to automatically protect all necessary endpoints.
impact_if_delayed: Data persistence APIs will be insecure or undeveloped.

description: The NestJS endpoint for formula execution needs to invoke the secure Lambda sandbox.
mitigation_plan: Define the Lambda input/output contract early. Implement a mock Lambda for initial integration testing.
impact_if_delayed: The entire custom mode execution flow is blocked.

description: The Offline Sync Manager is responsible for processing the action queue stored in IndexedDB.
mitigation_plan: Develop tasks in parallel by defining a clear interface for the IndexedDB service.
